title: White Slip-Ons Are In, Thanks to ‘Squid Game.’ That’s Good News for Vans.
sub_head: Footwear brand’s parent gets a revenue bump from popularity of classic sneakers
body:
The dystopian hit “Squid Game” is giving Vans slip-ons a boost.
The South Korean survival drama, Netflix Inc . ’s most-watched show, revolves around financially strapped adults playing traditional Korean children’s games on a secluded island for a cash prize of about $40 million. Contestants all sport white, slip-on sneakers, akin to the ones that Vans sells, and green tracksuits.
